name: The Devil's Dice (itch)
description:
Created for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam, the first jam that I participated in. 

Use WASD to move and Left Click to shoot. Use ESC to pause if needed 

Enjoy my take on the theme "Roll The Dice" where you play as a casino dealer in hell. The casino is set to close for a scheduled maintenance in 20 minutes and the customers are not happy about it at all so they cumulatively decide to go ape**** on you. After all, you can't go to hell twice!  Throw dice at the enemies to deal damage and pick up their essence to level up. Exit the game if you die, there is a bug that doesn't reset the timer.

Note. Don't expect a high quality game from my first jam :)
